## Logi Options+

[Logi Options+](https://www.logitech.com/en-us/software/logi-options-plus.html) lets you customize your [Logitech](https://www.logitech.com/) mouse and keyboard settings. It allows you to change function key shortcuts, customize mouse buttons, adjust point and scroll behavior, enable and disable touchpad gestures, and get on-screen notifications when your device’s battery runs low. It is a powerful tool that can help you personalize your Logitech devices to your liking.

You can find a list of supported devices for Logi Options+ at [Logitech Support](https://bit.ly/logi-options-plus-supported-devices). The list is updated regularly by Logitech.

### Package Note
This is a virtual package to help find and install [Logi Options+](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/logioptionsplus). It will install the program package `logioptionsplus` as a dependency.
